column3:
@robbak You should not merge upstream changes but rebase your pull onto current master. The way this pull is now it won't be accepted I think.
- `git checkout "local branch"`
- `git fetch upstream`
- `git rebase upstream`
- `git push origin "local branch" -f`
Needs to be rebased into one commit, and the same change should be made to the other OS's Makefiles.\n
I've messed up my clone, so I'll do it again, the right way.\nThanks.\n
